title: Alternative medicine
description: The UAE issues professional licence in the fields of Traditional, Complementary and Alternative Medicine (TCAM). Medical care can be acquired in the following streams of alternative medicine: Ayurveda, Chiropractic Medicine, Homeopathy, Naturopathic Medicine, Osteopathic Medicine, Therapeutic Massage, Traditional Chinese Medicine and Unani Medicine.
cleaned_text: Google Translate. The UAE mGovernment is not responsible for the accuracy of information in the translated language. Powered by Google This page provides information about the various forms of Traditional, Complementary and Alternative Medicine available in the UAE.
